title: 【蛋白搬运】【1.7.3+】逃出基岩监狱BEDROCK PRISON ESCAPE
author: PROTEIN、蛋白
txt_content:
本帖最后由 PROTEIN、蛋白 于 2013-12-22 20:06 编辑 

[bedrock]逃出基岩监狱Bedrock Prison Escape[bedrock]Storyline"Oh no! You got caught by the police, because you killed that innocent villager. Now you have to sit in prison for the next 15 years... But are not going to wait 15 years, you are going to escape this almost inescapable prison. Can you get to open air?"
故事情节:
"哦，不！因为你杀了无辜的村民，所以被警察抓住了，在未来15年你必须留待在监狱內......但你不是要默默地等待15年，而是要摆脱这个几乎无法逃出的监狱里，你能逃到户外吗?"


in this map, you're goal is to escape the Bedrock Prison without dying or failing...
在这张地图中，你的目标是为了逃出基岩监狱而没有死亡或失败...


Important notes:
- If you have problem with your spawnpoint when you die, you need to TP to x:393 y:80 z:-51.
- play in Minecraft 1.7.3 or higher or else there will be a weird minecart glitch where you spawn out of the map.
- If you have played this map and you like it, it would be nice if you leave a reply on this thread.
重要注意事项：
- 如果你死後，你的重生点出現错误，你需要把自己传送到 X：393 Y：80 Z：-51。
- 在minecraft 1.7.3或更高版本游玩，否则就会在你重生的地方出现一个奇怪的矿车故障。
- 如果你曾玩过这个地图，并且喜欢它，你應該在这网站上回复一下(指的是minecraft官方论坛)。

图片






规则
1.以冒险模式游玩（/gamemode 2）
2.只能用适当的工具破坏方块。所以，例如用十字镐打破煤炭和用剪刀剪破羊毛，但不可用十字镐打破灵魂沙和或用手打破地毯。
3.不要作弊，除非你被卡住了或你打破了地图內的一些東西。 
4.难度至少要设为容易。是的，你將要打一些怪物...
5.不要破坏矿车，它们將在游戏中帮助你，若你打破它们，你是无法完成这个地图的。
7.开启命令方块。如果你与朋友玩，你基本上不能正常地游玩地图。
8.玩得开心!
Rules:
1. Be in Adventure mode (/gamemode 2)
2. Only break blocks with the appropriate tool. So you can break coal with a pickaxe and wool with shears. But do not break soul sand with a pickaxe and/or carpets with your hands.
3. Do not cheat unless you are stuck or you broke something of the map. (cheats are turned on)
4. Play on at least easy difficulty. Yes, you will fight some mobs...
5. Don't break minecarts. They are there to help you and if you break them you are unable to finish.
6. Play with command blocks on. If you play with them off you basically can't play the map properly.
7. Have fun playing the map.
